item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: Repzik
item.description:
Agreed. There seems to be too much overrating and underrating of games recently.
You either see a 90-100 score or a 50-70 score. Not much in the 80’s anymore.

Slightly off topic, but there appears to be a bug on this page. It shows that there is a page two when there is not.

Read full topic
item.source: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?

item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
Raminator:

I just pre-ordered Killing Floor on Steam for about twenty bucks. It looks like a bit of harmless, mindless fun.

Killing Floor looks like Left 4 Dead and Resident Evil 4 had a sick, sick, baby!
However, if it’s crap, I don’t want to be the fool who pre-orderd it. I never buy a game without a review. Okay, some reviews are crap (GTA4 should NOT of gotten a 10), but they at least give you an idea on how good the game is.

Read full topic

item.description:

I loved the first 3 They hungers, so I’d be willing to pay for a new one… as long as it’s not too much.

item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Metritutus:

Strider mod also looked good, but that died too.

Looked neat, but the controls were impossible for walking a strider around, you need a big open space for those things, and the maps I played were very small and striders had trouble moving around them.

Cool tech demo though.

Read full topic

item.source: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?

item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
eternalness:

Paying for a mod = FAIL

End of story.

Yeah, but hey, it’s They Hunger. It’s the return of a classic Half-Life 1 mod.
Also, I beleive there have been about 1 Billion comments saying that they’d pay money to play Black Mesa: Source, which is, as we all know, a mod.

Read full topic
item.source: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?

item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
John Killer118:

Like people have been saying, it’s a commercial mod. As in PAY UP SUCKA’! I doubt they will throw away a highly anticipated mod and the money that comes with that anticipation. Unlike Black Mesa’s developers, They Hunger’s developers have a more worthwhile motivation to keep the mod/game alive: they get paid!
Also, Duke Nukem Forever hasn’t had an update since Christmas and we all know they’re still working on it! Glad I can reassure everyone.

I know that it’s a commercial game, I said it myself a few posts before.
And there have been reported cases of even commercial games being cancelled you know.

And Duke Nukem Forever comes out next week

Read full topic
item.source: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?

item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
eternalness:

Paying for a mod = FAIL

End of story.

It’s not a mod, though, it’s a comericial game licenced to the source engine. I’m looking forward to it, as the They Hunger trilogy was great for an early HL mod, and I loved the gameplay and npc/weapon variety.

Read full topic

item.source: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?

item.title: Any news about They Hunger: Lost Souls game?
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
Lord Grievous:

I never really played the original They Hunger trilogy, so I’m really looking forward to playing this game since it has great graphics and just looks way more scary than the original. So hopefully they haven’t died on us

Like people have been saying, it’s a commercial mod. As in PAY UP SUCKA’! I doubt they will throw away a highly anticipated mod and the money that comes with that anticipation. Unlike Black Mesa’s developers, They Hunger’s developers have a more worthwhile motivation to keep the mod/game alive: they get paid!
Also, Duke Nukem Forever hasn’t had an update since Christmas and we all know they’re still working on it! Glad I can reassure everyone.

Read full topic

item.description:
Imonfire:

I wish Half-Life: Enhanced didn’t die.

What’s so great about Half-Life with better graphics? (I hope people see the irony in this post.)

Anyway, I never played “They Hunger.” I know I should, but…
I’ll find time.
